decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: Floor Plans drawing no.2021-37W138 DU 01-B , Elevations drawing no.2021-37W138 DU 03 and Sections drawing no.2021-37W138 DU 03
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| Cycling parking and refuse and recycling provision indicated on the approved plans shall be provided and retained thereafter.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of occupiers of the area and in the interests of the future occupants of the development in accordance with policies with policies T6.1, 3.5, 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan 2013, policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Adopted Ealing Development (Core) Strategy, The London Plan (2021) T5,  SI 7 & 8 and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) sections 2 and 9.

| The site is within the worst mode aircraft 1-day noise contour predicted for 2016 (57dB). The sound insulation of the building envelope shall achieve the internal criteria for sensitive rooms, as specified in Section 6 Supplementary Planning Guidance 10. If compliance requires the windows to be closed, then acoustically attenuated mechanical ventilation and cooling shall be installed as necessary (with air intake from the cleanest aspect of the building).  The above shall be implemented prior to occupation of the development and thereafter be permanently retained.

Reason: In the interests of the living conditions of the future occupiers of the site in accordance with policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policies 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D14 of The London Plan (2021), Ealing SPG10 and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) - section 2 and Ealing's Adopted Climate Change and Ecological Emergency Strategy 2021.

| The development shall comply with an enhanced sound insulation value of at least 5dB above the maximum Building Regulations value, for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating different types of rooms/uses in adjoining dwellings/areas, namely, kitchen/living/dining room above bedroom of separate dwelling. The assessment and mitigation measures shall have regard to standards of the Council's SPG10 and noise limits specified in BS8233:2014. Approved details shall be implemented prior to occupation of the development and thereafter be permanently retained.

Reason: In the interests of the living conditions of the future occupiers of the site in accordance with policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policies 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D14 of The London Plan (2021), Ealing SPG10 and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) - section 2 and Ealing's Adopted Climate Change and Ecological Emergency Strategy 2021.
description: Conversion of single dwelling into two flats (1 x 1 bedroom and 1 x 2 bedroom) (Retrospective Application)
